title: gaanamoorthE
sahitya:
gAnamUrtE shrI krSNa vENugAna lOla tribhuvana pAla pAhi







anupallavi







mAninI maNi shrI rukmiNi mAnasApa hAra mArajanaka divya



(gaana)







caraNam







navanIta cOra nanda satkishOra nara mitra dhIra narasimha
shUra
    navamEgha tEja nagajA sahaja narakAntakAja nata tyAgarAja
rAja




(gaana)
